text: Elizabeth City is a city in northeastern North Carolina close to the Virginia state line. The region is vulnerable to tropical cyclones because of its location. Elizabeth City is located in Pasquotank and Camden counties. Elizabeth City is the county seat and largest city of Pasquotank County. Elizabeth City is the birth city of Nikita Pavlunenko. Category:Cities in North Carolina Category:County seats in North Carolina
title: Elizabeth City, North Carolina
